name: Sweet Dreams: (In)Sanitarium
description:
Sweet Dreams: (In)Sanitarium is a first-person horror video game which takes place in a nightmarish hospital. The player takes control of the hospital’s security guard, who falls asleep during his work hours, and wakes up in the middle of a nightmare version of the hospital. The player will have to work his way out of the hospital, avoiding the terrors that inhabit in the darkness while managing his sanity and uncovering the dark past hiding behind it’s walls.

Instructions are in 'how to play' section, in the main menu

Please consider that this game is a demo that is still in development.

If you enjoyed it, don't forget to rate our game with 5 stars :D that will encourage us so much!
